//
// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111
//
// Parameters:
//
//   float4 DNEResolution;
//   float4 DNESpecularAttenuation;
//   float3 DecalLocalBinormal;
//   float3 DecalLocalTangent;
//   float4 DiffuseOverrideParameter;
//   float2 DistanceFadeParameters;
//   sampler2D HeightmapTexture;
//   sampler2D LightAttenuationTexture;
//   float4 LightColorAndFalloffExponent;
//   float NvStereoEnabled;
//   sampler2D NvStereoFixTexture;
//   float4 ScreenPositionScaleBias;
//   sampler2D ShadowWarpFunctionTexture;
//   float4 SpecularOverrideParameter;
//   float4 UniformPixelVector_0;
//   float4 UniformPixelVector_1;
//   bool bEnableDistanceShadowFading;
//   bool bReceiveDynamicShadows;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name                         Reg   Size
//   ---------------------------- ----- ----
//   bReceiveDynamicShadows       b0       1
//   bEnableDistanceShadowFading  b1       1
//   DNESpecularAttenuation       c0       1
//   ScreenPositionScaleBias      c1       1
//   NvStereoEnabled              c3       1
//   DiffuseOverrideParameter     c4       1
//   SpecularOverrideParameter    c5       1
//   DNEResolution                c7       1
//   UniformPixelVector_0         c8       1
//   UniformPixelVector_1         c9       1
//   DecalLocalBinormal           c10      1
//   DecalLocalTangent            c11      1
//   LightColorAndFalloffExponent c12      1
//   DistanceFadeParameters       c13      1
//   ShadowWarpFunctionTexture    s0       1
//   NvStereoFixTexture           s1       1
//   LightAttenuationTexture      s2       1
//   HeightmapTexture             s3       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c2, 2, -1, 1, 0
    def c6, 1, 0.5, 0.0625, 0
    def c14, -9.99999997e-007, 15, 0, 0
    dcl_texcoord v0.xy
    dcl_texcoord4 v1.xyz
    dcl_texcoord6 v2.xyz
    dcl_texcoord7 v3
    dcl vPos.xy
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_2d s3

// Redundant Unreal Engine stereo correction disabled by DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --disable-redundant-unreal-correction --only-autofixed CRC32_1C02426C_0.txt
def c3, 0, 0, 0, 0 // Overrides NvStereoEnabled passed from Unreal Engine

    texld r0, v0, s3
    mad r0.xy, r0.zwzw, c2.x, c2.y
    dp2add r0.w, r0, -r0, c2.z
    rsq r0.w, r0.w
    rcp r0.z, r0.w
    mul r1.xyz, r0, c11.zxyw
    mad r1.xyz, r0.zxyw, c11, -r1
    dp3 r0.w, r1, r1
    rsq r0.w, r0.w
    mul r1.xyz, r0.w, r1
    mul r2.xyz, r0.zxyw, r1
    mad r1.xyz, r0.yzxw, r1.yzxw, -r2
    mul r2.xyz, r0, c10.zxyw
    mad r2.xyz, r0.zxyw, c10, -r2
    dp3 r0.w, r2, r2
    rsq r0.w, r0.w
    mul r2.xyz, r0.w, r2
    mul r3.xyz, r0.zxyw, r2
    mad r2.xyz, r0.yzxw, r2.yzxw, -r3
    nrm r3.xyz, v1
    dp3_pp r4.x, r1, r3
    dp3_pp r4.y, r2, r3
    dp3_pp r4.z, r0, r3
    nrm r3.xyz, v2
    dp3_pp r1.x, r1, r3
    dp3_pp r1.y, r2, r3
    dp3_pp r1.z, r0, r3
    nrm_pp r0.xyz, r1
    nrm_pp r1.xyz, r4
    mad_pp r0.xyz, r0.z, c2.wwxw, -r0
    texld_pp r2, c6, s0
    if b0
      mad r2.yz, vPos.xxyw, c7.xxyw, c7.xzww
      mul r3.xy, r2.yzzw, v3.w
      if_ne c3.x, -c3.x
        texld r4, c6.zwzw, s1
        add r0.w, -r4.y, v3.w
        mad r3.z, r4.x, r0.w, r3.x
        mov r3.xy, r3.zyzw
        mov r0.w, v3.w
      else
        mov r0.w, v3.w
      endif
      rcp r0.w, r0.w
      mul r2.yz, r0.w, r3.xxyw
      mad r2.yz, r2, c1.xxyw, c1.xwzw
      texld r3, r2.yzzw, s2
      mul_pp r2.yzw, r3.xxyz, r3.xxyz
      if b1
        dp3 r0.w, v3, v3
        rsq r0.w, r0.w
        rcp r0.w, r0.w
        add r0.w, -r0.w, c13.x
        mul_sat_pp r0.w, r0.w, c13.y
        mul_pp r0.w, r0.w, r0.w
        mad_pp r1.w, r3.w, r3.w, -r2.x
        mad_pp r3.xyz, r0.w, r1.w, r2.x
      else
        mov_pp r3.xyz, r2.x
      endif
      mul_pp r2.yzw, r2, r3.xxyz
    else
      mov_pp r2.yzw, r2.x
    endif
    mov_pp r3.z, c2.z
    add r3.xyz, r3.z, -c8
    mul_pp r3.xyz, r3, c9
    mad_pp r3.xyz, r3, c4.w, c4
    mov_sat_pp r0.w, r1.z
    add r1.w, r0.w, c14.x
    mul r0.w, r0.w, c0.w
    dp3_sat_pp r0.x, r0, r1
    add r0.y, r0.x, c14.x
    pow_pp r1.x, r0.x, c14.y
    mul r0.x, r1.x, c0.x
    mul r1.xyz, r0.w, r3
    cmp r1.xyz, r1.w, r1, c2.w
    mul_pp r0.xzw, r0.x, c5.xyyz
    cmp_pp r0.xyz, r0.y, r0.xzww, c2.w
    add_pp r0.xyz, r0, r1
    mul_pp r0.xyz, r2.yzww, r0
    mul oC0.xyz, r0, c12
    mov oC0.w, c2.w

// approximately 100 instruction slots used (4 texture, 96 arithmetic)
